en:
Right?! I gotta be honest...
Sometimes I'm just craving stories that are
told alongside works of art!

Whether they take place in a completely
different world with all kinds of species...
or simply twist our own reality...

<w>AAAAH, there's so many good works out
there!</w>

They may also be what keeps me up at
night, <w>haha...</w>

Hey, hey, you should totally come by every
once in a while!

You know, so I can tell you about what I'm
reading!
